ptrack.name: ptrack
ptrack.about: This project aims at allowing one to track their nicotine intake, specifically nicotine pouches, to help those quit or try and manage their usage.

macos-config.name: macos-config
macos-config.about: this is my list of macos apps and settings that are required to make macos work well with my (or any productive persons) workflow.

privacy.name: Privacy Policy
